page.title: 15TRADE (CONTINUED)
page.content:
Barnsley Market (cont.)
All kinds of goods can be bought in the market - food, clothes, footwear, carpets, jewellery, materials - in fact almost anything! There is also an area which sells second-hand clothes and is called locally the "Rag and Louse".
Barnsley Market is known throughout South Yorkshire as a place to visit in search of a bargain.But local people accept it as a very ordinary part of their everyday way of life.Market days bring people from outlying districts into the town.Old people, teenagers, Mums with their children, all enjoy the bustle and lively atmosphere of the town on market days.
